work.title: Lead DevOps Engineer
work.description: Implemented systems and processes to facilitate the overall efficiency and communication between the internal teams of the Technology department. Worked alongside the Directors of the Development, Product Management, Quality Assurance, and IT Operations to design, implement, and facilitate a culture of DevOps within the Organization. Increased customer satisfaction by increasing stability, reliability, and security of all products while increasing end user feedback and decreasing time to market of product features.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developer on 10+ development team maintaining ticket and work management SaaS web application and iOS, Android, and Windows mobile applications. C#, SQL Server backend with MVC/JavaScript (KnockoutJS) web frontend and Xamarin.Forms and WPF mobile frontends. Worked on individual projects to update internal development infrastructure to align with Agile and DevOps principles including transition to Git, Azure DevOps Services (VSTS) and implementation of CI/CD pipelines and environments.

work.title: Associate Consultant
work.description: Full-stack developer and Scrum Master for 10+ person development team, transitioning existing projects from .NET Framework and WPF applications to ASP.NET Core 2.1 and ReactJS web applications.
